articles.title: HMPV outbreak in China: Is it a new virus? How is it similar to Covid-19? Is there any vaccine? What we know so far | Mint - Mint

articles.content: An outbreak of Human Metapneumovirus (HMPV) in China has raised alarm globally. Several countries, including India, are monitoring the virus and its spread closely. But should one worry about it? How… [+4512 chars]

articles.title: ‘Bone-chilling cold’: 63 million hit by massive winter storm in US, 2 states declare emergency - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Snow and ice blanketed major roadways in nearly all of Kansas, western Nebraska and parts of Indiana. The storm is forecast to move into the Ohio Valley. | World News
